statements: DELETE FROM InventoryForecast WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC' AND demand_forecast > 100;
DELETE FROM demand_forecast WHERE product_id = 1 AND forecast_date = '2022-10-15';

DELETE FROM inventory WHERE current_stock <= reorder_level OR product_id = 202;

DELETE FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_inventory < 50 AND replenishment_date < '2022-09-30';
DELETE FROM DemandForecast WHERE product_id = 100 AND forecast_date = '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM InventoryLevels WHERE current_stock < optimal_stock OR product_id = 200;
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE stock_quantity < reorder_level;
